title: cultural_data_Discover_Florence_-_Firenze_audio_guide_and_map
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.discover.florence.
Application Name: Discover Florence - Firenze audio guide and map.
Number of Reviews: 40.00.
Application Description: Discover Florence is the ideal companion for your Florence visit! A self-guided walking tour, with hours of audio guides and a map that works offline, it's the ideal tour companion: ✔️Complete: with 50 attractions, discover wonders like the Old Bridge, the Lodge of the Lancers, Giotto's Bell Tower, Palazzo Pitti and many more.  Each attraction has a detailed and engaging audio guide.✔️Save: Save money on the traditional guided tours! Firenze it's big, don't get lost!✔️Audio Tour: extensive textual and audio guides for each point of interest. Discover the hidden pearls of Firenze!✔️Must-See: don't know where to start? We marked the places you must absolutely visit, to make sure you don't miss the best attractions in Firenze.✔️Offline: save on roaming charges, don't worry about 4G coverage, Discover Florence works offline!So if you are planning to visit Firenze, make sure to download Discover Florence for a complete and audio guide, map and tour!Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 975.00.
Overall Rate: 4.80.
First Page Reviews: Includes info on all mayor sights, texts are informative and not too long. If you only need historical info on Florence I would highly recommend this app. Does not include recommendations like where to eat etc but it is probably the best audio guide app in the store for Florence. I've also bought Di...Full ReviewIncludes info on all mayor sights, texts are informative and not too long. If you only need historical info on Florence I would highly recommend this app. Does not include recommendations like where to eat etc but it is probably the best audio guide app in the store for Florence. I've also bought Discover Pompei from the same developer and I wasn't disappointed. Easy to use and informative,I liked having both the audio and the written part for each location. We really enjoyed using the app to explore Florence. great information. saves a lot of money on tour guides Very interesting. The recorded voice is also very professional not computer generated as in other apps.
